about_the_game:
Play as Lapisphilia, the Heroine of Justice, as she tries to escape the dungeon that her mortal enemies, Gestark, has trapped her in. Having faced defeat time and again at the hands of Lapisphilia’s brute strength, Gestark have adapted and concocted a myriad of traps and countermeasures that they have deployed all throughout the dungeon as a last-ditch effort to bypass her strength and corrupt her from within and bring her over to their side. Meaning that relying on her brute strength like she always has will result in dire, and often consequences.

Lapisphilia will encounter various traps, monsters, and even the members of Gestark as she tries to find her way back to the surface.

The Evil Organisation Gestark has trapped Lapisphilia in a multi-layered, booby-trapped, underground dungeon! She must fight, or rather struggle, her way back to the ground level! Sealing and weakening barriers are all over the dungeon, negating Lapisphilia’s usually monstrous brute strength, forcing her to use her much neglected wits to find her way out safely.

Events / Recollection Room

The game boasts more than 90 events that can be encountered throughout the dungeon (as well as some post-ending bonuses). Encountering these events will affect Lapisphilia’s stats, which will ultimately impact the ending. All of these events can be replayed as many times as you want in the Recollection Room without affecting her stats, and unlocking one of them will also unlock some, but not all of the variations of the event as well. Hints can be found in the recollection room to help unlock every scene in the game.

Dungeon System

The multi-layered dungeon boasts a large variety of events that you may and will encounter. You will almost always have the option for Lapisphilia to avoid these scenes and preserve her morality. Lapisphilia’s stats will be the ultimate decider as to what kind of ending she will face, but there will be ways found within the dungeon to purify what has been corrupted within Lapisphilia. This means you can enjoy every event and scene in the dungeon without needing to worry about missing out on the different game endings.

…So long as you have secured the funds to afford it, that is.

Resource Management

Throughout the game, you will need to manage your stats. Money can be picked up from various interactable items throughout the game, or can be earned by completing tasks. The money you collect can be used to purchase stat-altering consumables that will help in achieving your desired ending.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Lapisphilia, the Heroine of Justice, has thwarted the Gestarks one too many times! In a final bid for victory, they have created a dungeon as their last-ditch attempt to finally bring her to her knees! Fight through enemies and traps to escape and get back on surface!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
